    Adrian MRV. aka AMRV || Ansuz (org.amrv)

      • resourceImage

        public static BufferedImage resourceImage(String path)
        Obtains an image given the path to that resource, capable of reading GIF (only first frame), PNG, JPEG, BMP, WBMP.
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the resource, starting from res/
        Returns:
        a buffered image using the given image

      • streamImage

        public static BufferedImage streamImage(InputStream stream)
        Obtains an image given the data input stream directly.
        Parameters:
        stream - the data stream to be read
        Returns:
        a buffered image containing the stream or a default image if any exception occurs

      • resourceImage

        public static BufferedImage resourceImage(String path,
                                          int width,
                                          int height)
        Obtains an image given the path to that resource, capable of reading GIF (only first frame), PNG, JPEG, BMP, WBMP.
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the resource, starting from res/
        width - the width of the result image
        height - the hegiht of the result image
        Returns:
        a buffered image using the given image

        width - the desired width of the image

      • saveArray

        public static boolean saveArray(String path,
                                CharSequence[] array)
        Saves an array of strings or any other char sequence to a file in the system, returning the result of the operation.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the file (it the file does not exisist, it will create it)
        array - the data to be saved
        Returns:
        true if the operation was succesful, false otherwise

      • saveData

        public static boolean saveData(String path,
                               CharSequence data)
        Saves a char sequence to a file in the system, returning the result of the operation.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the file (it the file does not exisist, it will create it)
        data - the data string to be saved
        Returns:
        true if the operation was succesful, false otherwise
